title: Start with Google Sheets
text: Begin by opening Google Sheets in your web browser.

title: Locate the File Menu
text: Find the 'File' menu option at the top left corner of Google Sheets.

title: Select Import Option
text: Click on 'Import' from the dropdown menu under 'File'.

title: Choose Upload
text: Select 'Upload' to bring in your Excel file from your computer.

hintAnswer: Open Google Sheets and select 'File' > 'Import' > 'Upload' to choose your Excel file.
title: Complete the Import
text: Follow the prompts to upload and import your Excel file into Google Sheets.
choices: Drag and drop the Excel file into Google Sheets.
Open Google Sheets and select 'File' > 'Import' > 'Upload' to choose your Excel file.
Email the Excel file to yourself and open it in Google Sheets.
Copy and paste the data from Excel into Google Sheets.
